channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Tulip Time in Pella
item.description: In central Iowa, the Dutch celebrate colorful origins.

item.title: Downhill in Thunder Bay
item.description: For a ski weekend, this friendly city belongs on the Eh list.

item.title: Life on Mille Lacs
item.description: Minnesota's big lake, lined with fishing towns, also is a capital of Ojibwe culture.

item.title: The good life in Traverse City
item.description: On Lake Michigan, this beach town has a high IQ and refined appetites.

item.title: The door to Door County
item.description: A longtime gateway, Sturgeon Bay also makes a great getaway.

item.title: Exploring Thunder Bay
item.description: Beauty is all around Lake Superior's biggest town.

item.title: Excursion to Stillwater
item.description: This historic Minnesota river town is a favorite weekend getaway.

item.title: Best brew fests
item.description: Quaff to your heart's content at these sampling parties in Wisconsin, Minnesota and beyond.

item.title: Eating in the Amana Colonies
item.description: In eastern Iowa, a historic village has a long tradition of feeding people well.

item.title: Duluth 101
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about visiting this lively port town on Lake Superior.

item.title: Escape to Minnesota's North Shore
item.description: For stressed-out city folks, the shore of Lake Superior is hallowed ground.

item.title: 10 great getaways from Chicago
item.description: Get out of town to lounge on beaches, gawk at river canyons and go on brewery tours.
